Query.Sql: select distinct l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier, l1.NHSNumber as nhs_number, drugs.Code as DrugSourceValue, coalesce(l5.EpisodeStartDate, l5.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureStartDate, coalesce(l5.EpisodeEndDate, l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell, l1.CDSActivityDate) as ExposureEndDate, case when l5.EpisodeEndDate is null and l5.DischargeDateHospitalProviderSpell is null then 32220 else 32818 end as DrugTypeConceptId from [omop_staging].[cds_line01] l1 inner join [omop_staging].[cds_high_cost_drugs] drugs on l1.MessageId = drugs.MessageId inner join [omop_staging].[cds_line04] l4 on l4.MessageId = l1.MessageId left join [omop_staging].[cds_line05] l5 on l5.MessageId = l1.MessageId

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
Start date of the episode, if exists, else the start date of the spell, if exists, else the message date.
End date of the episode, if exists, else the spell discharge date, if exists, else the message date.
If the patient was discharged `32818` otherwise `32220`.
